resources.string:
They are naturally occurring sugars,starches and fiber which are found mainly plant food and can occur in dairy products.
 They play a couple of roles in a living organism such as providing energy for day to day activities.
 Some food that are high in carbohydrates include:
 bread
 chapati
 ugali
rice
chips
bhajia
pilau
yams
arrow roots and many more.

they are macro nutrients that are important in building muscle mass.they are commonly found in animal and plant products.
 they are responsible for growth and maintenance of body tissues,transport and store nutrients,balancing body fluids and maintaining proper pH.
 Food that are high in proteins include: mutton
fish
beef
pork
beans
green grams
cow peas
eggs
yogurt
milk

they are micro nutrients that are required by the body to carry out a range of functions.They are categorized into two (fat soluble and water soluble vitamins).
 examples of vitamins include Vitamin A,B1,B2,B3,B5,B6,B7,B9,B12,C,D,E and K
 Food that contain vitamins include: apples
oranges
spinach
cabbage
bananas
broccoli
mushrooms
traditional greens
